name: Lost In Her Memories
description:
Lost In Her Memories is about a group of young adults that are trapped inside a monastery against their will, they can't escape until they solve the mystery behind that place, death  awaits for them.

Contains 5 wrong endings, depending on the option you chose; some strong images and loud sounds; save points in every chapter.

This is my first game made in Twine Sugarcube, of course has many errors, consider this project as a prototype. (Works in Full HD resolution and 16:9 aspect ratio, other resolutions are not tested).
